About: In one of the most exciting races in Formula 1, Dutch driver Max Verstappen snatched first place in the Saudi Grand Prix, Sunday evening. Dutchman Max Verstappen emerged victorious in a breathtaking battle with Charles Le Clair, to win the Saudi Grand Prix in the Formula 1 World Championship.

A state of terror prevailed in the Jeddah Formula 1 circuit, after German racer Mick Schumacher crashed into the wall of the race hard. During the second qualifying lap, on Saturday evening, Schumacher, the Haas team driver, lost control of his car on the lap and crashed hard into a concrete wall, destroying his car completely.
Mercedes: Hamilton may retire from Formula 1 after the events of the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix
Formula 1 .. 'decisive decision' over the protest against Verstappen's victory
Abu Dhabi Prize.. Verstappen takes pole in the decisive race
Aston Martin has become the first team to unveil its new 2022 Formula One car in a virtual party after unveiling it on Thursday.
Lewis Hamilton won the Saudi Grand Prix on Sunday, who stopped twice, delaying the decision to Abu Dhabi, after the Mercedes driver tied the points with Max Verstappen of Red Bull.

On Saudi soil, the challenge comes with another taste.. a unique race that combines adventure, excitement and championship, and a new version of the Dakar Rally, where cars and motorcycles race for days
The curtain comes down on the Saudi Dakar Rally 2023 on Friday 17th January which is considered the most challenging race in the world.
